summary: A custom player house mod built off a gorgeous cliffside waterfall with lovingly placed decor.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]INTRODUCING[/color]

Mossyside Manor, a very planty, wilderness-themed retreat built off of a cliffside and waterfall. This home features a full deck, custom crafting areas, a clothing washing area, a backyard farm, trapdoor, full kitchen with working cooking pot, and lots and lots of unique static decorations.

THIS IS A HEAVY HITTING MOD. I will do my best to come up with a less FPS hitting version for those who still want the mod, but not all the lag from the clutter. :)

[youtube]TYO-OdWsiNA[/youtube]

Courtesy to Nozi87 for this awesome video!


[color=yellow]NOTES[/color]

Please know that this is my VERY FIRST MOD! I've poured my time into trying to make it a quality mod and if there are any bugs, CTD issues or any other possible things that can / will go wrong in modding, I will do my absolute best to fix them as time allows! :)

[b]Has been cleaned with TESVEdit.[/b]


[color=yellow]CREDITS[/color]

Special thanks for meshes & textures from:

Stroti
Ayoh
InsanitySorrow
Tamira
Toddkay
Blary
Artisanix
Tueffel
Oaristys

THANKS TO ELIANORA FOR INSPIRING ME TO TRY MODDING! <3
author: Quirkster
